Uses of Package
utils.exceptions

  • Packages that use utils.exceptions 
    Package Description
    controllers
    Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests.
    controllers.admin
    Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests for ADMIN users.
    controllers.apps
    Package containing plugin specific controllers.
    controllers.members
    Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests by MIDATA members.
    controllers.providers
    Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests by HEALTHCARE PROVIDERS.
    controllers.research
    Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests by RESEARCHERS.
    models
    Package containing all data classes that are stored in the database.
    setup  
    utils
    Package containing utility classes
    utils.access
    Package containing the RecordManager and query engine.
    utils.access.index
    Package containing classes to build, maintain and query encrypted indexes
    utils.auth
    Package containing classes for authorization and authentication of users and services
    utils.collections
    Package containing helper functions
    utils.evolution
    Package containing classes for automatic account schema evolution
    utils.exceptions
    Package containing exception classes used by the platform.
    utils.fhir  
    utils.fhir.transactions  
    utils.json
    Package containing JSON utilities
    utils.messaging
    Package containing classes for sending messages
  • Classes in utils.exceptions used by controllers 
    Class and Description
    AppException
    common superclass for application specific exceptions.
    AuthException
    exception that is thrown if the user is not authorized to do the current action or read requested data
    BadRequestException
    exception that is thrown if an error occurs because a request with illegal parameters has been issued.
    InternalServerException
    exception that is thrown if an error occurs that is caused by a bug or internal problem.
  • Classes in utils.exceptions used by controllers.admin
